overview: After arguing with their playboy father, teenage sisters Amy, Susie and Tessie decide it's time to become independent women. Once the girls realize they can support themselves, they open the door to a whole new world of adventure.
tagline: Celebrate your most glorious July 4th this year with glamorous Amy, brainy Susy and mischievous Tessie!
title: Amy, Susie and Tessie
